item.title: My DevOps Journey: Building a Static Website
item.description: Introduction As a passionate individual eager to delve into the world of DevOps, I found myself facing a common question: “What is a good beginner project to gain practical experience?” After exploring various resources and communities, I stumbled upon an insightful blog post titled “The Best DevOps Project for a Beginner” by Logan Marchione. Inspired by his guidance, I embarked on an exciting journey to build my own static website, and I would like to share my personal experience and lessons learned along the way.
